api_list.name: Get Product Reviews

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: you can send a request according to the totalPageCount value in the response to pull all comments.

api_list.name: Get Product Details
api_list.description: returns products details. title, description, rating, winner merchant, promotions and more.

api_list.name: Search products
api_list.description: returns products that come with the relevant keyword

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number for pagination. You can see the total number of pages in the response. First page is 0.
